decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game through a mix of counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By utilizing cards like Narset and Teferi to limit opponent's options, while efficiently removing threats with Path to Exile and Cryptic Command, the deck aims to outvalue and outpace the opponent. The inclusion of Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor allows for additional card advantage and flexibility in dealing with various threats. The deck aims to stall the game until it can secure a win condition, such as through creature beats with Celestial Colonnade or ultimate abilities from Teferi, Hero of Dominaria.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Dredge mechanic to fill your graveyard with creatures and use various cards like Faithless Looting and Altar of Dementia to quickly bring them back onto the battlefield. This allows you to quickly overwhelm your opponent with a swarm of creatures like Hogaak, Vengevine, and Gravecrawler, while also utilizing cards like Bridge from Below and Carrion Feeder to create additional value and synergies. The deck aims to set up explosive combos and quickly close out games before your opponent can react effectively.

The main concept of this deck revolves around utilizing the Dredge mechanic to fill the graveyard with key creatures like Vengevine, Hogaak, Gravecrawler, and Bloodghast. By sacrificing creatures with Carrion Feeder and Altar of Dementia, players can trigger effects from Bridge from Below and bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard to overwhelm the opponent. Faithless Looting and Stitcher's Supplier help dig through the deck and fuel the graveyard with cards to enable this combo strategy, allowing for explosive turns and massive swings in advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. By utilizing a combination of burn spells and efficient creatures, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently, often leading to a win before the opponent can stabilize. Key cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Goblin Guide, and Eidolon of the Great Revel provide early pressure, while burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Rift Bolt, and Lava Spike finish off the opponent. The mana base is optimized for quick and consistent access to the necessary colors for casting spells.

This deck focuses on building up +1/+1 counters on creatures efficiently, with the use of cards like Hardened Scales, Steel Overseer, and Arcbound Ravager. The goal is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of powerful creatures, using synergies like Animation Module creating servo tokens and Walking Ballista dealing direct damage. The deck also includes artifact support with Mox Opal and Welding Jar to protect key pieces. The key strategy is to maximize the value of each +1/+1 counter and create a formidable board presence that is hard for the opponent to deal with.

The deck focuses on using counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers to control the game and deny your opponent their game plan. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy, answer threats efficiently, and generate card advantage through card draw and flashbacks. By utilizing a combination of counterspells and removal, alongside powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win the game through attrition and superior card advantage.

This deck focuses on filling the graveyard with creatures to constantly bring back with recursion effects. By sacrificing creatures to Altar of Dementia and using cards like Faithless Looting and Stitcher's Supplier, the deck can quickly get key pieces into the graveyard to combo off with Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis and Vengevine. Bridge from Below and Bloodghast provide additional value when sacrificing creatures, creating a powerful engine that overwhelms opponents with a quick and resilient board presence. This deck aims to disrupt opponents while building up its own game plan for a quick win.

The deck focuses on quickly casting low-cost spells to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard and deal damage with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage. The deck also includes burn spells like Lava Spike, Lightning Bolt, and Lava Dart to clear the way and finish off opponents. It uses cards like Faithless Looting and Finale of Promise to help cycle through the deck and cast multiple spells in a turn. Additionally, the inclusion of Gut Shot and Surgical Extraction provides disruption and graveyard hate options.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling the Allosaurus Combo, using cards like Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to cheat out powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Labratory Maniac, then using Nourishing Shoal to gain a massive amount of life and draw through the deck in one turn. The goal is to set up a win condition where the player can draw their entire deck and win the game in a single turn, utilizing the powerful cards such as Summoner's Pact and Manamorphose to ensure they have the necessary resources to execute the combo efficiently.

The focus of this deck is to quickly cast inexpensive spells to trigger the Arclight Phoenix's ability and swarm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage. With a high density of low-cost burn spells and cantrips, the deck aims to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard and close out the game with a flurry of direct damage. The inclusion of cards like Light Up the Stage and Faithless Looting allows for additional card draw and flexibility in casting spells efficiently.

The deck focuses on using Deceiver Exarch and Pestermite in combination with Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker to create an infinite combo that allows for unlimited creature tokens or damage. It also utilizes cards like Wrenn and Six, Jace, the Mind Sculptor, and Snapcaster Mage to control the board and draw cards. The deck includes various removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Cryptic Command to deal with threats and protect the combo. The mana base is designed to support the necessary colors for the combo pieces while maintaining card advantage and tempo.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with creatures and then utilize cards like Carrion Feeder, Gravecrawler and Hogaak to generate value and overwhelm the opponent. By using cards like Altar of Dementia and Bridge from Below, the deck can create a powerful engine that allows for explosive combos and strong board presence. Additionally, the deck includes ways to bring back key creatures from the graveyard, such as Vengevine and Bloodghast, to continually pressure the opponent and maintain a strong board state.

This deck focuses on utilizing graveyard interactions and sacrificing creatures to fuel powerful combos, ultimately aiming to overwhelm the opponent with a large board presence. By consistently dredging cards into the graveyard and using cards like Altar of Dementia to sacrifice creatures, the deck can quickly bring back powerful threats like Hogaak and Vengevine. The key strategy revolves around utilizing the graveyard as a resource to generate value and create explosive turns that can lead to a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to use cards like Stitcher's Supplier and Faithless Looting to fill up the graveyard with creatures like Bloodghast, Gravecrawler, and Vengevine. By sacrificing creatures to cards like Carrion Feeder and Altar of Dementia, you can trigger effects from Bridge from Below and bring back powerful creatures like Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with a constant stream of creatures and graveyard interactions, ultimately winning through a strong combo and aggressive gameplay.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using Human creatures. By playing powerful creatures like Champion of the Parish, Mantis Rider, and Thalia's Lieutenant, the deck aims to quickly build a threatening board presence. Cards like Aether Vial and Noble Hierarch allow for mana acceleration and efficient creature deployment. Additionally, disruptive elements like Meddling Mage and Deputy of Detention help control the opponent's resources and game plan. The mana base of the deck supports the tribal synergy of Humans while providing flexibility for casting spells of different colors.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill up your graveyard with spells by using cards like Faithless Looting, Thought Scour, and Manamorphose, in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard and attack your opponent aggressively. The deck also utilizes powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Crackling Drake to control the board and deal damage to your opponent. Additionally, cards like Thing in the Ice and Aria of Flame provide additional win conditions and can help close out games quickly. The deck aims to be fast, efficient, and proactive in order to overwhelm the opponent.
